summary: Diff updates Tailwind theme colors to set `bottom-nav-bar` to `#1a1a1a`, and updates project metadata files. There is no diff evidence that the BottomNav container class/style was updated to actually use the `bottom-nav-bar` color token on the mobile bottom nav strip.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the mobile bottom navigation bar container (the strip behind the icons) to use a clearly visible, non-transparent background color of #1a1a1a while keeping the existing per-button background styling and active-state highlight behavior unchanged.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows only a Tailwind color token addition/change; it does not show any change to the BottomNav (md:hidden) container markup/classes to apply `bg-bottom-nav-bar` (or equivalent) to the strip behind the icons, so the UI may not change.

hallucinated_features.description: Project tracking/state update entries (AR-1/AR-2/AR-3) added/updated in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is a UI styling change request and does not ask for maintaining/updating project management metadata files.
This file is not mentioned in the BuildRequest requirements and appears unrelated to implementing the UI change itself.
